short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your internet experience more enjoyable
short.fr: Rendez votre expérience internet plus agréable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- EasyNav blocks numerous intrusive ads
- Our extension will automatically close cookie popups.
- EasyNav works in the background and requires no intervention from you after installation.
- This cleanup also helps to speed up your browsing experience.
